trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Front Royal
There was one other sighting in Front Royal on or around October 25th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsthis event occurred on sunday, october 25, 2009. it was a clear and sunny day. i was traveling on interstate 81 in northern virginia, a few miles north of the exit to front royal, virginia, when i saw a round transparent rotating blue ball\orb of light very near the ground. i am hesitant to say exactly how large it was. it was not tiny like a small ball nor was it huge. i took a photograph at 11:23:15 a.m. eastern standard time per my camera. a blue ball does appear in it. the blue ball then disappeared. shortly thereafter i looked up at the sky and at 11:25:42 am eastern standard time i photographed what i saw, a round blue orb (it did appear to be more solid than the one on the ground) and a day time moon. i was excited and asked my husband if he could see the ���blue��� moon. he was driving but did look up, saw it and said it was probably some type reflection. after downloading the photograph and viewing it enlarged on my screen i not only saw the moon and the blue orb, i saw something that appears to be a craft with a ring of lights and some type vapor trail. i did not see this on that day. on the ground are two transparent square items that appear to be blowing. i don���t recall seeing them that day. they could be a reflection of a newspaper or something as i made the photographs from inside the car. six seconds later i made another photograph which shows the orb and moon. the craft is missing. the next photograph i took immediately after the previous one when enlarged shows faintly the blue orb and other two orbs. during this time i was not particularly afraid as it happened so quickly. immediately thereafter i began to feel anxious and uneasy. this was not to be the end of a most eventful day. an hour or so later we exited the blue ridge parkway near luary, virginia. here in a field near the highway i saw and photographed a strange shaft of light which is possibly a sunbeam. to a layman it appears too dense. later that day on i-81 in southern virginia i again saw a rotating light ball and some amazing things. i���ll make another report about this as i have photographs of this event too. earlier in the week i saw two round balls of light hovering in new hampshire which i have reported on mufon. the new hampshire investigator was very thorough and helpful. still i was hesitant to report anything else for fear of being considered a ufo nut. after viewing the ufo hunters program on these lights i realized that other people are seeing them. what they are i do not know. i have never seen any such thing before that fateful week in october and never seen any since nor do i desire to. i am going to attempt attach photographs. i have them and have enhanced one only to show detail. i still have the original disk that was in my camera of all the sightings and will not erase it. i have continued to be anxious since that time. the day of this event my husband wanted to drive on to alabama. i insisted on stopping as i did not want to be out at night. i am attempting to attach photographs. i have applied an effect to make the objects stand out in the last two; however, it did not change the objects, only made them easier to see. i still have the originals.
Summary: Traveling I-81 saw a blue rlight ball on the ground; then in the sky along side moon and later photo showed a craft
